Package com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.auditlog

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AuditLog
    Interface for audit logging.
    AuditLogFacade
    Facade interface encapsulating the creation of a concrete AuditLog implementation.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccessedAttribute
    This class represents the access to a security relevant attribute in the context of an audit log.
    AccessRequester
    Represents the requester of an access to a security relevant attribute in the context of an audit log.
    AuditLogger
    Main class of the audit log functionality.
    DefaultLoggerAuditLog
    Implementation of AuditLog that redirects to the default logger.
    ScpCfAuditLog
    Implementation of audit logging that uses the Cloud Foundry (HANA XS) library.
    ScpCfAuditLogFacade
    Audit log facade used with CloudFoundry.
    ScpNeoAuditLog
    Implementation of audit logging that uses the SCP Neo library.
    ScpNeoAuditLogFacade
    Audit log facade used with the Neo platform.
    ScpNeoAuditLogRequestContextListener
    Implementation of RequestContextListener that performs the JNDI lookup of the connectivity configuration and authentication header service objects on SCP Neo.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AccessedAttribute.Operation
    Enum representing the type of operation performed on the accessed attribute.
